text: Péter Magyar (; born 16 March 1981) is a Hungarian politician and lawyer. He is the President of the Respect and Freedom (Tisza) Party, Hungary's largest opposition party, since 2024. He has been a member of the European Parliament since July 2024. He has been a critic of Viktor Orbán and was a member of his Fidesz party until 2024. His great-uncle Ferenc Mádl was President of Hungary from 2000 to 2005. From 2006 until their divorce in 2023, Magyar was married to politician Judit Varga.
